original_text: After that, they made burnt offerings every day, and also at the time of each new moon. They made the right sacrifices for the special festivals, when people met together to worship the Lord. They also offered special gifts that people had chosen to give to the Lord.
korean_text: 그 후에는 항상 드리는 번제와 초하루와 여호와의 모든 거룩한 절기의 번제와 사람이 여호와께 기쁘게 드리는 예물을 드리되

sentences.original_text: After that, they made burnt offerings every day
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그들은 매일 번제를 드렸다

sentences.original_text: and also at the time of each new moon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 매 월삭 때에도 그렇게 했다

sentences.original_text: They made the right sacrifices for the special festivals
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 특별한 절기를 위해 올바른 제사를 드렸다

sentences.original_text: when people met together to worship the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 함께 모여 주님을 경배할 때

sentences.original_text: that people had chosen to give to the Lord
